Cashiery Application Use it for sales in your store or pharmacy Earn cashback, many valuable gifts and many profitable offers Kashiri applied more sales and more profits.\n \n
With Cashiery collecting points from each sale\n And benefit from these points monthly.\n - Points exchange in cashBack.\n - You can exchange points for free goods.\n - You can enter drag to get gifts very valuable.\n\n
With the Cashiery application, you can take advantage of many possibilities for free.\n - Review the prices of distributors moment by moment.\n - Check out the latest special offers to increase sales.\n - Learn about special discounts for more profits.\n - Your requests will also reach the supplier without any effort from you.\n - And also will not reduce the products from the shelf anymore.\n - And you will not increase your products too much.\n - Cashiery continues directly and continuously with producers.\n - Cashmere allows you to easily sell and buy.\n - Cashiery acts as a special account program.\n\n
And soon to sell through the Delfry without any additional effort
